items.sentence: Tom and Mary have been taking care of our dog.
Tom and Mary don't usually eat lunch together.
Tom and Mary argued about what should be done.
Tom and Mary aren't going to do that together.
Tom and Mary aren't able to do that very well.
Tom and I've done that together several times.
Tom always complains about what Mary is doing.
Tom almost always does that just before lunch.
The man at the door introduced himself as Tom.
That was the last day that Tom every saw Mary.
